body:
Monsterbash is one of my new favorite maps on walls because of its interesting gameplay. In the quads, you need to collect emeralds to trade for gear like armor and weapons.  In the middle are mobs to add a challenge. You can also collect ghast tears to purchase more items for combat after the walls drop.

Here is my strategy for winning! Thanks for watching!
http://youtu.be/9XagpSEGorI

music: seduction-varien
http://youtu.be/05_s-gGItuA
